Package it.polimi.se2018.model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    This interface describes an action taken by a player
    Card
    This class describes the object Card (both objective card and tool card)
    DieCoord
    The interface implemented by DiceContainerCoord
    Memento<T>
    Interface implemented by DiceContainer
    ObjCard
    Interface that describes the object ObjCard (both private and public) Implemented by PrivateObjCard and PublicObjCard Extends the interface Card
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    This class represent the player's board
    BoardCoord
    This is the class that contains the board and the coordinates
    Cell
    This class represents the object Cell of the board
    DiceContainer
    This class describes a generic object which contains dice
    DiceContainerCoord
    This class contains the DiceContainer and its index
    Die
    This class describes the object Die
    Flip
    This class describers the action FLIP
    Match
    This class represents the Match object, which contains all the components necessary for defining the game's state
    MoveToDicebag
    This class represents the action 'MoveToDicebag'
    PickState
    This class describes the action 'PickState'
    PlacementError
    This class represents the generic placement error
    Player
    This class describes the object Player
    PlayerMove<T>
    A general purpose class that represents a move created by a player
    PlayerState
    This class represents the Player's state The state is contained in EnumState
    PrivateObjCard
    This class describes the object PrivateObjCard Implements ObjCard
    PublicObjCard
    This class describes the object PublicObjCard Implements ObjCard
    Reroll
    This class describes the action 'Reroll'
    Restriction
    This class represents the Restriction of color and value present in the board
    Score
    This class represents the player's score in the game
    SetValue
    This class describes the action 'SetValue'
    Switch
    This class describes the action 'Switch'
    ToolCard
    This class represents the object ToolCard
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CellState
    Enumerator that contains the possible state in which a Cell could be
    Color
    Enumerator that contains all the possible colors
    Component
    Enumerator that contains some key components of the game
    EnumState
    Enumerator that contains all the possible states in which a user could be
    Flags
    Enumerator used by PlacementError class to describe the error type
